subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Alessandro Del Piero scored twice as visiting Juventus beat Real Madrid, 2-0, to reach the Round of 16 in the Champions League. Manchester United played to a 1-1 tie against Celtic in Glasgow. Del Piero left the field in a late substitution to applause from both sets of fans. A goal by Ryan Giggs in the 84th minute earned a point for Manchester United, the defending champion, which ran its unbeaten streak in the tournament to 17 games.
